# More about me
Before joining UCSC, I majored in economics, studying Bayesian econometrics and finance.
I am one of the [2023 Quad fellows](https://www.quadfellowship.org/quad-fellows).

My non-academic activities include playing pool, DIY keyboard, cooking and listening to rock music.
